member.name: LVINSERTGROUPSORTED
member.summary: Used to sort groups. It is used with LVM_INSERTGROUPSORTED.

member.name: LVINSERTGROUPSORTED.pfnGroupCompare
member.summary: Pointer to application-defined function LVGroupCompare that is used to sort the groups.

member.name: LVINSERTGROUPSORTED.pvData
member.summary: Data to sort; this is application-defined.

member.name: LVINSERTGROUPSORTED.lvGroup
member.summary: Group to sort; this is application-defined.
